content.description: Start the same The High road but move right only a couple feet off the ground.  The hand holds are decent but there is some hard heel hooking.  Tranverse into and finish the same as Ghetto Coolade.
content.location: Starts the same as the High Road and finishes on Ghetto Coolade.

content.description: Sit start on a small ledge using good side pulls.  Trend right till our about ten feet up and then reach way out left for a small side pull.  Fancy footwork allows you to reach ever father left to a better side pull.  Match on this then throw up to the sloppy rail and then straight up using what ever you can to top out.
content.protection: Bring lots of pads and a few spotters.  A good one to work on TR first as a fall from the crux (top)would have bad consequences.
content.location: up the center of the first cliff band between dirty harry and deer run

content.description: SDS under the small overhang with your feet on the low angle slab.  use a big sloppy pinch in the mini cave and a small crimp above it and move up and to the left for couple move on nice big holds.  Then traverse right making a big lunge to a big ledge on Aiden's great escape and top out the same as that problem.  A nice warm up with fun moves.
content.protection: a pad or two and a spotter is recommended
content.location: starts right below the tall overhanging hace and then move right into Aiden's great escape about 5 feet 5-6 feet off the ground.

content.description: Start with a pinch on the start hold of Aiden's great escape and a crimp on your right. Bump to triangle on right up to the rail. Over to the bomber lip on left corner up to the sidepull, sloper and top out....It's less confusing when you see the face of the climb, mainly a sart to straight up..
content.location: to the right of Aiden's great Escape

content.description: This takes the line straight up the steepest part of the wall.  The crux half way up way you must match on a sloppy rail and move off of it.
content.protection: This is only PG13 if it is bouldered.  Top rope by slinging two trees with lots of webbing or many pads and spotters if you are brave enought to boulder this.

content.description: Start: match on credit card crimp up to intermediate sloper/crimp, up to large shelf hold to top out horn area.
content.location: To the right of Aidens great escape on the slab around the corner.

content.description: The crux is starting this.  sit sart matched on slopper and lousy feet and bump up and left.  match stem left and hit the next good hold out left and its over just top out.  The crack is not on
Great holds but a bit of a sketchy top out with the trees behind you.
content.location: right side of first cliff band

content.description: Match crimp to upper crimp to finsh on crack , completely linear route, topout horn by Dudeus maximus.
content.location: So the right of Aidens Great escape on the corner seam.

content.description: Sit start under small bulge and climb up slightly overhanging rock on good holds and lousy feet.  Then move out left and top out.
content.location: Walk 300 yards down deer trail to the second band of rock

content.description: Two small bands of of rock faces.  Problems are 10-20 feet and are pretty dirty.
